Welcome your pottery class journal.

Hello! My name is Carla Paloma from Buenos Aires, Argentina.

Site info + Contact

In this site, you will find a constantly evolving course plan. I sometimes include carefully cureated videos to study a particular technique and pointers to solo projects matching your current expertise.

If you have any questions please email me at
palomaclay@tutanota.com
